title: Looking for a support main to duo
body:
Hi, Im currently moving around silver 3-silver 4 as an adc main, I play mostly Ezreal, corki, kogmaw, lucian (not had the best games on lucian) I can also play other adcs but im trying to focus on improving these champs rather then expanding my champ pool. Im looking for a support main around the same rank as me, skype is required, i want to be able to talk. I dont mind what champs you play mostly but I like playing with thresh braum and janna the most.


Please please leave a message here and before adding me ingame. Thanks

replies.body: well, i main support. last season the highest i went to was s2 or something, currently s5.
Hey dude, I'm a Support Main. I play a lot of thresh/blitz/bard can play janna if you like. I was B1 last year and B3 this year. Add me if you want to duo !!
Hey man add me. Currently b2 but was silver 4 last season. having trouble rising playing support
